name: Earth: DEFENSE
description:
Delay the inevitable death of the earth (one day) by defending it against more current threats from space in this kind of tower defense game, but on a whole planet!

Controls:
  • Left MB ⇾ Select
  • Right MB -> Cancel
How to play:
  • Research new defense buildings
  • Build them
  • Defend earth
Credits:
  • PositiveZero Games (Art and Programming) Website: positive-zero.itch.io
  • “Bruno” (Programming)
  • Steve Krute (Music and SFX) Instagram: @stevek.music
